title: Did you know that in may 2010, one programmer bought 2 pizzas for 10,000 BTC
raw_text: Did you know that in may 2010, one programmer bought 2 pizzas for 10,000 BTC. Today, that’s worth hundreds of millions. The famous ‘Bitcoin Pizza Day’ shows how value evolves. Zenlit Pizza Day is coming soon!
key_points: Did you know that in may 2010, one programmer bought 2 pizzas for 10,000 BTC
Today, that’s worth hundreds of millions
